raw_data.releaseNotes: Improvement and bug fixes.
raw_data.description:
Document Editor is a powerful iOS app designed to provide a comprehensive editing experience for documents on your mobile device. With its intuitive interface and robust set of features, Document Editor allows you to seamlessly create, edit, and collaborate on documents anytime, anywhere. Whether you're a student, professional, or simply need to work on the go, Document Editor is your go-to solution for editing documents on iOS.


Key Features:
1. Document Creation and Editing: Create new documents or import existing ones from cloud storage services like iCloud, Dropbox, or Google Drive. Edit text, format fonts, apply styles, and modify layouts effortlessly.

2. Rich Formatting Options: Take full control of your document's appearance with a wide range of formatting tools. Adjust font styles, sizes, colors, and apply bold, italic, underline, or strikethrough effects. Format paragraphs with alignment, indentation, and line spacing options.

3. Document Collaboration: Seamlessly collaborate with others by sharing documents via email, AirDrop, or cloud storage services. Enable real-time co-editing to work simultaneously with teammates and track changes for easy review.

4. Review and Comments: Add comments, annotations, and track changes within the document. Efficiently review and address feedback from collaborators, ensuring a smooth editing process.

5. Document Management: Organize your documents into folders, rename files, and easily search for specific documents using keywords or file names. Sort and filter documents based on creation date, modification date, or alphabetical order.

6. File Compatibility: Document Editor supports a wide range of document formats, ensuring compatibility with files created on various platforms. Open and edit DOC, DOCX, and RTF files seamlessly.

7. Offline Editing: Enjoy the flexibility to work on your documents even without an internet connection. Edit offline, and once you're back online, the app will automatically sync your changes.


9. File Export and Sharing: Export your edited documents as Word files, PDFs, or HTML. Share them via email, messaging apps, or save them to cloud storage for easy sharing and collaboration.

Benefits:
1. Enhanced Mobility: Edit documents on the go using your iPhone or iPad, without the need for a computer. Stay productive and make edits whenever inspiration strikes.

2. Seamless Collaboration: Collaborate with colleagues, classmates, or clients in real-time, improving productivity and streamlining the editing process.

3. Convenient Editing Tools: Enjoy a feature-rich editing experience with a comprehensive set of formatting options, making it easy to create professional-looking documents on your iOS device.

4. Improved Organization: Keep your documents neatly organized, making it effortless to find and access specific files whenever you need them.

5. Compatibility and Flexibility: Work with various document formats, ensuring that you can seamlessly edit files created on different platforms and share them without compatibility issues.

6. Offline Access: Work on your documents even when you're offline, ensuring uninterrupted productivity, regardless of your internet connection.

7. Data Security: With cloud sync and backup, your documents are securely stored, preventing data loss and providing peace of mind.



3-DAY FREE TRIAL

• Try out all paid features free for 3 days

• Select a plan that best suits your needs

• Cancel anytime without any obligations
Yearly
- Monthly plans at 499 Rs/Month & Yearly Plans at 2999 Rs/Year

apps.title: Office Flexispace
apps.description:
Office FlexiSpace is a system that allows any of your employees to book a workstation in the office by selecting a desk on the map. You can manage office spaces yourself by creating new offices and floors in the built-in constructor (available in the web version of Administration). Make sure your office follows the recommended seating density standards to ensure safe spacing between desks. 

More and more companies are using a hybrid office work model, where employees can alternate between working remotely and in the office. Use Office FlexiSpace workstation booking system to allow your company's employees to find a workstation in advance to come into the office. Take full advantage of the hybrid office, letting your employees find a place for teamwork or a secluded spot to focus on their tasks. 

Control the number of people in the office at any one time and limit the density of workstations to keep employees at a safe distance from each other. Get a daily report of which workstations were in use today to organize efficient cleaning. Use the Heatmap report (available in the web version of Administration) to identify gathering places in the office and use this information to further develop your office space. 

The system also includes an office checkout confirmation feature, so you can make sure employees aren't just booking workstations, but actually use them at their chosen times. Generate unique QR codes for each desk and place them at workstations, so that employees can only confirm bookings when they are in the office. Unconfirmed reservations are automatically canceled, so you'll be sure that workstations aren’t in use. 

Searching on the office map will give you the opportunity to orient yourself faster and introduce newcomers to the additional benefits of your office. 

Do you use Microsoft Teams corporate messenger? Connect a chatbot to receive notifications about upcoming arrivals or to use it to manage workplace reservations.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
- New field types for extra services when reserver meeting room
- Bugfix

apps.title: Alliance Virtual Offices
apps.description:
The Alliance Virtual Offices app is a seamless, intuitive booking platform that lets you discover, book, and pay for the perfect workspace in just a few taps.
Plan meetings in seconds. 
Book a conference room, day office, or co-working space at verified locations across the U.S.
Save valuable time with quick setup—your name, company, and contact info are stored for a faster checkout experience.

Explore Thousands of Meeting Rooms Nationwide
Easily find meeting rooms by entering location details like city, state, zip code, or street address.
Narrow your results using filters for: Instant booking, Attendee count (workspace capacity), Price range, Amenities, and Neighborhoods.
View space details and available amenities directly on the listing page and book in just a few taps.

Book in Seconds
- Reserve spaces by the hour or day
- Choose from flexible, secure payment options: Apple Pay, Credit/Debit, PayPal
- Enjoy fast, secure checkout
- Receive confirmation directly to your device

Perfect For:
- Freelancers and entrepreneurs seeking professional meeting spaces
- Small and medium-sized businesses with evolving space needs
- Corporate teams requiring off-site venues
- Government departments and public sector organizations
- Business meetings and client presentations
- Team off-sites and collaborative workshops
- Interviews and training sessions

Designed for the Modern Business
Built with real estate pros, attorneys, consultants, and remote teams in mind.
Book from over 1400 vetted locations across the trusted Alliance network.
Connect with clients in fully-furnished spaces tailored to your industry’s needs.

Seamless Experience from Start to Finish
No onboarding, no friction. Just search, book, and get back to work.

About Alliance Virtual Offices
Alliance Virtual Offices provides on-demand workspace, business phone numbers, and live receptionists for the modern professional.
This app is part of our mission to supply you with smart, efficient tools to run your business—anywhere.

apps.title: Divine Office
apps.description:
The Divine Office App is an opportunity for you to participate in the recitation of the Liturgy of the Hours, an ancient and meditative collection of psalms, hymns and scripture that represent the public prayer of the Christian community.
If you are unable to pray in community, but love the contentment of praying with others, a praised feature of the Divine Office App lets you view locations where other Christians around the world are simultaneously praying with you.

This version is the official prayer book of the Catholic Church, however, it is suitable for all Christian faith traditions. It contains the official text and audio of daily prayers from the Liturgy of the Hours of the Roman Catholic Church (Breviary) and has been approved for use in the United States by USCCB.

The Divine Office App is designed to make praying more convenient, enjoyable, and simple enough for anyone to use. It automatically downloads the appropriate prayers for each office, every day of the year, including Solemnities, Feasts, and Memorials.

When St. Paul advises us in 1 Thessalonians 5:17 to “pray without ceasing,” he intends more than simply bowing our heads and speaking to God on a regular basis. He means for us to adopt an ongoing attitude of prayer that is a way of life and a constant intercession for the salvation of all mankind.

As the mystical body of Christ prays in unison, it fulfills what Paul advises as Christian conduct, that believers at once pray for the good of themselves, their neighbors, and the world. In this way, prayers become liturgy, a way to fulfill our divine calling and a practical approach for addressing the suffering of the world.

apps.title: PDF Editor: Read, Scan & Sign
apps.description:
Edit, Scan, Convert, Annotate & Sign Your PDF Documents With A1 Online PDF Editor!


A1 PDF Editor App is your all-in-one PDF Editor app. This one single online PDF converter app allows you to view, scan, edit, annotate, convert, draw and sign PDFs, allowing you to handle your important PDF documents in an easy, breezy and safe way!


What Can You Do With A1 PDF Editor App?


→ View & Read PDF Documents
Received a document you need to view and read? A1 PDF Document Editor lets you view any type of document which is easy to read with our high quality PDF opener app.


→ Scan Physical Documents
Scan your physical documents and convert them into universally readable documents using your phone’s camera. Our advanced scanning technology ensures your scanned PDFs look professional with automatic perspective correction, color adjustments, and intelligent cropping tools.


→ Edit PDF & Annotate Documents Easily
Edit PDF, write, annotate and leave comments easily on your doc with our customizable sticky notes and intuitive drawing tools. Highlight key passages, add text boxes for in-depth comments, and respond to existing annotations. (Apple Pencil support on iPad Pro for enhanced precision).


→ Convert Different Documents Into PDFs
With A1 PDF Document Editor, you can convert:
~ Word Document → PDF
~ Excel Spreadsheets → PDF
~ Presentations → PDF
~ Images (JPG, PNG) → PDF
~ Plain Text (TXT) → PDF
And more into PDF documents with docs to PDF converter within seconds! Because your work is important and we love speed ;)


→ Sign Documents Without Hassle
Fill out your forms and sign without any hassle using your finger or Apple pencil. Our electronic signature system makes sure your original signatures look just as good and accurate on your PDF documents.


→ Share, Export & Collaborate on PDF Documents
Invite colleagues or clients to collaborate by effortlessly sharing PDF files via email, link, or text message. Set permission levels for recipients, allowing them to view, edit, or sign the PDF document according to your needs. Print, fax, or convert Word to PDF, Excel to PDF, and PowerPoint formats for maximum flexibility with our file PDF converter.


→ Insert Images & Draw Effortlessly
Unleash your creative side by inserting images, editing images and using our multiple PDF tools to draw and beautify your PDF document.


Why Should You Choose A1 PDF Editor?


# Compatible With All Apple Devices - The A1 PDF Editor is compatible with all Apple devices – iPhone (iOS 15.0 or later), iPad (iPadOS 15.0 or later), Mac (macOS 12.0 or later and a Mac with Apple M1 chip or later)
# All In One App - No need to download multiple apps to scan, edit, convert, or annotate  PDF docs; this one app allows you to do it all effortlessly!
# Work Offline - Fluctuating internet? No need to panic! Work offline with our PDF doc editor, the changes will be synced as soon as you are back online :D
# Free Premium Trial - Unlock the Full Potential with a Free Trial. Experience all the premium features of A1 PDF Editor free for 3 days! Choose a subscription plan that best suits your needs and cancel anytime without obligation.


Please note: Subscriptions are charged through your App Store account. Subscriptions automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Manage your subscription through your App Store account settings after purchase.




What are you waiting for? No need to download multiple PDF Editor, PDF Scanner, PDF Manager, PDF Organizer, PDF Reader Or PDF Text Converter apps. Make your life easier with A1 PDF Editor today!


Terms of use - https://blog.a1apps.co/terms-of-use-a1-pdf-editor/
Privacy Policy - https://a1office.co/ios-privacy-policy/

apps.title: Qik Office
apps.description:
Qik is the #1 AI Office app that effectively organizes work & business data across any organization. It revolutionizes the way you work with over 30 innovations.

Qik Office auto-organizes communication & collaboration data using the most advanced work organizer mimicking a physical office. Qik for the first time brings back the essence of being organized and working in physical office to every device. Furthermore, Qik can truly bring technology into physical office meetings making you a truly AI driven organization.

Qik AI auto-generates minutes, discussion points & action items of every meeting and auto-assigns action to-dos in the room. It auto-organizes all business communication & collaboration data in one place, whether work happens online, in-person or hybrid, using the most advanced AI work organizer.

Qik Meeting provides the fastest online meeting rooms & the first ever in-person meeting rooms along with the most advanced scheduler. Qik rooms unify schedules, agendas, online/in-person meetings, chats, notes, to-dos, files, whiteboards, recordings, transcriptions, minutes of the meeting, action items and many more using AI.

Along with the highest level of security and privacy for enterprises using several innovations like enterprise data cocooning, room encryption etc., Qik Office surely increases team's productivity by over 300%.



Terms of Service: https://qikmeeting.com/terms

Privacy Statement: https://qikmeeting.com/privacy-policy

Have a question? Contact us at https://qikmeeting.com/contact

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Bug fixes and improvements: We've fixed several issues, including one that caused duplicate users in meeting attendance lists and another that prevented photos from being taken in the chat screen.

Enhanced meeting experience: We've improved audio routing for a smoother meeting experience and resolved an issue with incorrect past data in room schedules.

Seamless for everyone: A critical bug affecting guest users has been resolved, ensuring a consistent and reliable experience for all.

apps.title: Unify Office
apps.description:
Work from anywhere with the leading all-in-one team messaging, video conferencing, and phone calling solution. You and your team can stay more connected, focused, and productive while staying home and keeping your social distances.

Here’s how Unify Office helps teams stay efficient during this time:

*Collaborate with superior team messaging*
Message individuals or teams in real time to stay connected and bring remote workers together. Easily collaborate with file sharing, task management, and a shared calendar. All for free. No plan required.

*Stay connected with seamless video meetings*
Launch video meetings directly from the app for real-time collaboration with screen sharing, chat, and markup tools.

*Make HD calls with an enterprise phone system*
Get HD voice quality, call forwarding, and advanced call features all while displaying your business number as your caller ID. Use Wi-Fi, carrier minutes, or cellular data on any mobile device.

*Send a fax from anywhere*
Send files through your mobile device with secure and easy online faxing. Attach files from Dropbox, Box, Google Drive, or any Microsoft Office application, or submit faxes online via email.

A Unify Office subscription is required for certain product features. Features will vary by product and plan. A free subscription is available with limited capabilities.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Minor enhancements and Bug Fixes

- Increase the visibility of call block in incoming call window
- Add Transfer as quick entry to favourite contacts list

apps.title: Boxer - Workspace ONE
apps.description:
Introducing Workspace ONE Boxer, a faster, smarter email, calendar and contacts app that can be configured to the unique way you work. 

With tools like custom swipe gestures and quick-reply templates, quick sharing of calendar availability and more, Boxer is the most efficient way to manage your email. Get more done in less time with Boxer!
 
**Modern Email, Calendar and Contacts in a Single App**
Productivity never looked so good. With an intuitive design built for the modern professional, Boxer helps you easily conquer your email, manage your calendars, and find colleagues quickly on-the-go.
 
**Intelligent, Configurable Inbox to Fit the Unique Way You Work**
Boxer helps you work smarter and faster than ever with features like bulk actions, configurable quick replies, custom swipe gestures, a send availability feature you have to see to believe, and many more.
 
**Handling Your Day is a Breeze**
Full-featured calendar management is just a tap away, keeping you on top of your schedule. Easily create and manage events, view calendar attachments, send meeting invites and view availability inside of Boxer.
 
**Single Tap Dial into Conference Calls**
Another phone conference? Say goodbye to flipping back and forth to enter an access code or meeting number on your mobile device. With Boxer, you can instantly dial into conferences with a single tap!
 
**Protect Your Data and Your Peace of Mind**
Boxer ensures your business stays your business. Boxer is built to support some of the most security-conscious organizations in the world. But great security doesn't have to come with an impossible user experience. With touch ID and PIN support, you can access the things you need in an instant.
 
 
Want more? Visit https://www.omnissa.com/products/workspace-one-productivity-apps/

apps.title: GoWork Coworking Office Space
apps.description:
The GoWork App allows you to connect with our community of creators, entrepreneurs, and business leaders. Get help, book workspace, events, conference rooms, and more. Get connected with thousands of like-minded people.

EASE OF ACCESS
Easily book inspiring workspaces, meeting rooms, and enquire for booking our versatile event spaces. Users can also pick the nearest GoWork locations they want to work from. Additionally, users can book a tour and send inquiries for event space directly from the App, instead of having to go to the website.

CONNECT & GROW
Connect with our network of members and partners through our community features, including the chat feature and our community feed. You can also find and book events curated by our event and community staff--from classes to product launches and national seminars.

MANAGE YOUR TEAM
We’re all about teams that grow and change. Users can now add and remove their company’s team members directly from App. Moreover, you can also assign roles for your team members to help you manage the team in GoWork.

MEMBERSHIP SUPPORT
Receive updates about your building straight from our team members. Find your way around the building to discover public transportation, landmarks, and lifestyle centers to play after a hard day of work. Submit a support request for anything you need or any membership questions.

REDEEM PERKS AND BENEFITS
Get updates about benefits and perks available to you every day. Enjoy benefits from our partner businesses, from F&B outlets, e-commerce brands, and even cloud storage services! Moreover, enjoy discounts on GoWork products using vouchers!

QUALITY-OF-LIFE FEATURES
Users now have multiple user wallets for different purposes. Users can book spaces using company credits or their own personal credits.

Not a member? Learn more at go-work.com how to join our community today.

Office Space in Town (OSiT) provide beautiful serviced office space to suit organisations of all sizes - right in the heart of the business centres of London including Blackfriars, Monument, Liverpool Street, Mayfair, St Paul’s, Waterloo and Euston. apps.title: Idle Office:Building Story
apps.description:
Welcome to your very own Office company where you can bring in world-renowned businesses and fulfill your wealth dreams!

Freedom to upgrade decor
Tired of fixed decorations? In Idle Office:Building Story, you have complete control over all decorations. Minimalist, business, cute... any style is achievable.

From rags to riches
No funds and nothing to show for it? No problem, here you can experience the thrill of going from rags to riches. Give proper instructions based on the company's development and work towards success step by step.

The cute pets heal your hearts
Tired after a long day of work? Take a break and check out some cute pets! You might even come across some exotic animals in addition to the common cats and dogs!

apps.title: Vodafone Office Spaces
apps.description:
The Vodafone Business Office Spaces user app allows employees to manage and book spaces easily. 

Benefit highlights: 
- Plug and Play hardware 
- Facilities managers can manage and monitor desks or meeting rooms remotely 
- Employees can book desks or meeting rooms remotely 
- Employees can use NFC to tap on the office dot or sticker to instantly book the space. 

Vodafone Business Office Spaces bundles hardware, application and connectivity into a complete E2E solution. Useful for facility managers and employers interested in balancing office space demands with the megatrend of the new evolved office.  

This app is for use with the Vodafone Business Office Spaces Solution and only works in combination with the other components. 

For the configuration of the devices, please refer to the Vodafone Business Office Spaces Setup application.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
- Overnight booking feature
- Vehicle Registration: You can now register your vehicle in “My Account” for easier parking access.
- Smart Parking Rules: Vehicle type now affects which parking spots you can book (e.g. EV-only spaces).
- Overnight Bookings: Reserve workspaces overnight where supported.
- Bug Fixes & Performance: Stability improvements and smoother experience.

apps.title: Become Office Queen
apps.description:
Ready to dive into an exciting office adventure? Meet "Become an Office Queen" - a fun and interactive game where you get to decide your own story.

In this game, you play a young girl just starting her work life. It's more than just an ordinary life simulation game - you have the power to change your destiny based on the choices you make.

Every decision has a consequence, and the story has different endings. Whether you're choosing your outfit, dealing with drama, or experiencing that flutter of first love, it's all up to you! Want to win your boss's heart or maybe even take his place? You can do it all in this thrilling game!

Here are some awesome features that you will love:
- Make choices that will change your story’s outcome - you decide your own fate
- Discover all of the different endings 
- Develop relationship with your favorite character - will you be friends, enemies or lovers? 
- Customize your makeup and design your outfit - your style reflects your unique personality 
- Play your own path towards the OFFICE QUEEN

"Become an Office Queen" is more than a game - it's a journey filled with love, romance, adventure, and drama. Download to make your dreams come true, and start your adventure today!

apps.title: Polaris Office for MobileIron
apps.description:
IMPORTANT : Please note that this application is only for subscribers of MobileIron AppConnect. This application requires unique passcode which is allowed only for MobileIron AppConnect valid enterprise users.
Polaris Office Enterprise with MobileIron is an enterprise application and not meant for consumer use.

■ About Polaris Office Enterprise with MobileIron!
Polaris Office Enterprise with MobileIron is a Mobile Office application that allows MobileIron AppConnect users to view/edit Microsoft Office (Word, Excel and PowerPoint) documents on Smartphone and Tablet under the MobileIron policy. Users can view/edit text files and view .pdf and .hwp files as well. POLARIS Office’s excellent rendering quality shows all the texts, charts, pictures and etc. of the documents made with Microsoft Office on a PC as the original itself without any losses. And Polaris Office Enterprise with MobileIron provides powerful editing features and an intuitive interface that allows you to edit document easily. Polaris Office is always focusing on the customer’s actual demands, so it is being improved to the way how to provide the customers with high level of productivity and usability.
Now, you can safely and conveniently view/edit important documents on your Mobile devices.

■ Key Features of Polaris Office Enterprise with MobileIron
View and edit Microsoft Office documents / View .pdf and .hwp files / Support Quick Scroll / Support around 80 types of Smart Arts & 18 types 2D, 3D charts / Provide more than 500 editing features / Useful & various templates for new creation / Slideshow mode / Page transition effects for slide shows / Pointer and drawing for slideshows

■ Advantages of Polaris Office Enterprise with MobileIron
View and edit various document types / excellent compatibility with Microsoft Office documents / Fast document loading speed / Fabulous Presentation at anytime and anyplace / Centralize IT configuration, management, security and control with MobileIron Mobility technology.
- Mobile Office application installed on more than 900 million mobile devices!
- No 1. Global Market share on Mobile Office app!
- Implementing with MobileIron Mobility Suite technology to POLARIS Office

■ Supported Formats
Edit (doc/docx, xls/xlsx, ppt/pptx, txt) / View (pdf, hwp)

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Applied latest MobileIron SDK
Minor bug fix

apps.title: Collabora Office
apps.description:
Collabora Office is a text editor, spreadsheet and presentation program based on LibreOffice, the world's most popular Open Source office suite — and now it's on iOS, enhancing your possibilities to work on mobile devices.

This app is in active development, feedback and bug reports are very welcome.

Supported files:

• Open Document Format (.odt, .odp, .ods, .ots, .ott, .otp)
• Microsoft Office 2007/2010/2013/2016/2019 (.docx, .pptx, .xlsx, .dotx, .xltx, .ppsx)
• Microsoft Office 97/2000/XP/2003 (.doc, .ppt, .xls, .dot, .xlt, .pps)

Report issues:

Use the bugtracker and attach any files that caused problems via 
https://col.la/iosBug . Please note that anything you enter in the bugtracker will be public.

About the app:

Collabora Office for iOS is based on the LibreOffice code for macOS and other platforms. This, combined with a new front-end based on Collabora Online.

Credits:

iOS port is mainly based on the work of Collabora engineer Tor Lillqvist, with help of Patrick Luby. Please find a detailed list of contributors in the credits: https://col.la/iosCredits 

License: Open Source — Mozilla Public License v2 and other

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Heya! Good to see you again, loyal release-notes-readers. This release we've made some improvements to our selection handles - though we know they're still a little clunky and have some more fixes planned. We've also made some improvements to how the notebook bar works in tablet mode.

As always, you can find the code that was used to build this release on our GitHub: this mobile release is based on code from Collabora Online 25.04.5

apps.title: WeWork: Flexible Workspace
apps.description:
Enhance your productivity with one of the world’s premier flexible workspace providers. Easily book coworking space and private offices for the day and meeting rooms by the hour. WeWork provides the tools you need to get more out of your workday. Get started by downloading today and search from hundreds of locations directly in the WeWork app.

Unlock flexible space when and where you need it.* Plus, you can upgrade your experience with our optional workspace management software designed to bring your hybrid strategy to life. Whether you want to work closer to home, empower remote teams, or manage your own private office, we’re here for all the ways you work.

WeWork connects employees, entrepreneurs, and businesses of all sizes in a networking environment like no other. Browse and book your own coworking space, meeting room, or private office directly in app for a seamless experience.

WEWORK FEATURES

COWORKING & OFFICE SPACE FOR ANY NEED
Find an available coworking space or private office in just a few taps
Book based on your needs—from hot desks by the day to meeting rooms by the hour
Enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi and unlimited tea & coffee

FIND A LOCAL WORKSPACE FOR YOU OR YOUR TEAM
Set up your own private office for your team with a WeWork membership
Book a meeting room for important events and invite and manage guests seamlessly
Get data and analytics on your team’s workspace usage**

NETWORKING AROUND EVERY CORNER
Discover and RSVP to WeWork events and networking opportunities
A collaborative workspace experience—throughout your workday and or at WeWork community events
WeWork is more than just coworking and office space. Share ideas and grow professionally with members from all over the world.

Experience a new way to work at your local WeWork location or at one of our hundreds of locations around the globe. From collaborative coworking spaces, meeting rooms, or your own private office, WeWork has you covered. Download today and boost your productivity.

*Subject to operating hours, locations, and availability.
**This feature is accessible by select memberships and is not available for WeWork On Demand members. WeWork On Demand is only available in the United States, Canada, Australia, Singapore, United Kingdom, Ireland, Germany, France, Spain, Poland, Netherlands, Belgium, Sweden, Czech Republic, Mexico, Brazil.

apps.title: ZEN PDF PRO
apps.description:
ZEN PDF: Turn your mobile device into an all-purpose scanner in seconds.

Are you still worried about tedious document processing? ZEN PDF is here! Just a mobile phone, instantly start a new experience of efficient office work - turn the device into a portable scanner + professional editor + secure file manager, and control the entire process of document processing anytime, anywhere! The smart office expert in your pocket.

Core function highlights, redefine efficiency, all-purpose PDF processing, easy operation at your fingertips.

Freely edit PDF: adjust the document size and layout as you like, optimize text and pictures with one click, and even a novice can become a layout master in seconds!
Quick merge/split: multiple reports are instantly integrated into a complete document, and large files are split into independent chapters as needed, saying goodbye to the tedious manual operation!
Image to PDF: Convert high-definition images to a PDF format that can be saved and shared with one click, retaining visual details, and perfectly archiving design drafts, notes, and certificates!

Smart image editing, creative control at your fingertips
Crop / Flip / Filter: Precisely crop extra borders, one-click correction of tilted images, dozens of filters give images a professional texture, beautification operations are done in one step!

HD wallpapers, mobile phone screens are no longer the same
10,000 + HD wallpaper library: Daily update of massive exquisite wallpapers, change the mood of the device after work, inspiration is always online!

Super fast sharing and storage
One-click sharing of email attachments and links, support for fast transmission on multiple platforms;
Local encrypted storage of documents, no third-party intervention, privacy and security guaranteed;
Directly print PDF, save the trouble of format conversion, and output meeting materials instantly!

Why choose ZEN PDF?
Minimalist operation: intuitive interface, scan - edit - share in three steps, zero learning cost;
Multi-scenario adaptation: covers all scenarios of office, study, and life, and can easily hold business contracts, class notes, and travel notebooks;
High-definition image quality: with the support of intelligent OCR technology, the text is clear and sharp, and the color of the picture is truly restored;
Safe and reliable: local storage + encrypted transmission, sensitive files are protected throughout the process, and privacy will never be leaked!
Download now to unlock a new way of smart office!
—— Your mobile office will be light from now on ——

apps.title: Microsoft Teams
apps.description:
Whether you’re connecting with your community for an upcoming activity or working with teammates on a project, Microsoft Teams helps bring people together so that they can get things done. It’s the only app that has communities, events, chats, channels, meetings, storage, tasks, and calendars in one place—so you can easily connect and manage access to information. Get your community, family, friends, or workmates together to accomplish tasks, share ideas, and make plans. Join audio and video calls in a secure setting, collaborate in documents, and store files and photos with built-in cloud storage. You can do it all in Microsoft Teams. 

Easily connect with anyone: 
• Skype is now part of Teams. Continue where you left off with your chats, calls and contacts in Microsoft Teams Free. 
• Meet securely with communities, teammates, family, or friends.
• Set up a meeting within seconds and invite anyone by sharing a link or calendar invite. 
• Chat 1-1 or to your entire community, @mention people in chats to get their attention. 
• Create a dedicated community to discuss specific topics and make plans*.
• Work closely and collaborate by keeping conversations organized by specific topics and projects with teams and channels.
• Video or audio call anyone directly in Teams or instantly convert a group chat to a call. 
• Use GIFs, emojis, and message animations to express yourself when words aren’t enough.
 
Accomplish plans and projects together: 
• Send photos and videos in chats to quickly and easily share important moments.
• Use cloud storage to access shared documents and files on the go. 
• Organize shared content in a community — events, photos, links, files —so you don’t have to waste time searching*. 
• Get the most out of your meetings by using screen share, whiteboard, or breakout in virtual rooms.
• Manage access to information and ensure the right people have access to the right info, even when people join and leave projects.
• Use task lists to stay on top of projects and plans - assign tasks, set due dates, and cross off items to keep everyone on the same page. 

Designed to give you peace of mind: 
• Securely collaborate with others while maintaining control over your data.
• Keep communities safe by allowing owners to remove inappropriate content or members*.
• Enterprise-level security and compliance you expect from Microsoft 365**. 

*Available when using Microsoft Teams with your Microsoft account.

**Commercial features of this app require a paid Microsoft 365 commercial subscription or a trial subscription of Microsoft Teams for work. If you’re not sure about your company’s subscription or the services you have access to, visit Office.com/Teams to learn more or contact your IT department. 

By downloading Teams, you agree to the license (see aka.ms/eulateamsmobile) and privacy terms (see aka.ms/privacy). For support or feedback, email us at mtiosapp@microsoft.com. EU Contract Summary: aka.ms/EUContractSummary

Consumer Health Data Privacy Policy   
https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2259814

apps.title: Office Word: Edit Word Docs
apps.description:
Document editor is a powerful application that allows you to create, edit, and manage your documents on the go,which is designed to enhance your productivity and streamline your workflow. Whether you need to convert Word documents or images to PDF, or customize your work using a variety of templates, our app is your all-in-one solution for document management.

Create Documents
With our document editor app, creating new documents has never been easier.You can quickly input text, insert images, and organize your content just as you want. Start crafting your ideas into professional-looking documents right on your mobile device!

Edit Documents
Editing documents on the go is simple and efficient using document editor. You can open existing files, make modifications, and save changes seamlessly. Our app supports a variety of editing options, such as formatting text, adjusting font styles, and adding bullet points or numbered lists.

File Format Conversion

apps.title: OH~! My Office - Boss Sim Game
apps.description:
An office simulation game that tests your lightning-fast reflexes and multi-tasking skills. Manage your employees and make sure they don't slack off by "micro-managing" them with an assortment of "reinforcement tools" at your disposal. 

Whip Your Staff Into Shape!

Slackers beware! Whether it is a nap or playing on your phone, those who slack off will be severely punished! To ensure every moment of your employees’ time is spent raising profits, you are given “The Hammer of Productivity” to bring out the “best” in your staff!

Money Well Spent

Profits earned should always be invested in growing your business empire. Equip your office with better facilities, equipment, office pets or give yourself a makeover and arm yourself with a variety of “motivational tools”. Huge selection of upgrades to take your company to the next level!

Your staff is the company’s best resource. The game features a large cast of colorful and unique characters each with their personal abilities and talents. Build up your dream team and become the next billion-dollar unicorn!

- 15 Chapters to push your company to all new levels!

- Over 60 unique staff to choose from, 10 different types of staff each with 6 unique abilities!

- Customize, modify and arrange your office layout. Special office items to help you become a global company!

- Deep avatar system to customize yourself to be the ultimate boss!

- Don’t just act like a Boss, Dress like a Boss too!

- Lots of “management tools” at your disposal!

- 100% Pet-Friendly Office!

- Cast of Colorful Characters

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

apps.title: AO Office Pro
apps.description:
AO Office is the world's first porting of OpenOffice for iOS and it's a powerful and complete office suite for OpenOffice / LibreOffice documents.

You can view, edit, import, and export PDF, Word, Excel & PowerPoint documents using full features of the OpenOffice in the PC version.

AO Office has 5 components:
Writer: a word processor you can use for anything from writing a quick letter to producing an entire book.
Calc: a powerful spreadsheet with all the tools you need to calculate, analyze, and present your data in numerical reports or graphics.
Impress: the fastest, most powerful way to create effective multimedia presentations.
Draw: lets you produce everything from simple diagrams to dynamic 3D illustrations.
Math: lets you create mathematical equations with a graphic user interface or by directly typing your formulas into the equation editor.

* AO Office is a forked project from the Apache OpenOffice project.
AO Office is not affiliated with the Apache OpenOffice and LibreOffice projects.

■ Features ■
- View / edit / import / export documents
- High reproducibility for Open Document Format
- Export and import documents as PDF
- Formatting paragraphs
- Create stylized text with special effects
- Support for extensive file formats
- Support for embedded object
- Support for Dropbox / iCloud Drive / Google Drive / OneDrive / Box / NAS / WebDAV
- Support for Audio and Video
- Support for recovering the unsaved work
- Support for modern encryption

■ Supported File Formats ■
AO Office can open and save to:
- Microsoft Word (DOC / DOT / RTF)
- Microsoft Word 2007 (DOCX / DOTX / DOCM)
- Microsoft Excel (XLS / XLT)
- Microsoft Excel 2007 (XLSX / XLTX / XLSM)
- Microsoft PowerPoint (PPT / POT)
- Microsoft PowerPoint 2007 (PPTX / POTX / PPTM)
- OpenDocument (ODT / ODS / ODP / ODG / ODF)
- Portable Document Format (PDF)
- OpenOffice.org1.0 / StarOffice6.0 (SXW / SXC / SXD / SXI / SXG / SXM)
- Text (TXT / CSV / XML)
- HyperText Markup Language (HTML)
- Adobe Photoshop (PSD)
- Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG)
- Windows Metafile (EMF / WMF)
- Tagged Image File Format (TIFF)
- Data Interchange Format (DIF)
- SYLK (SLK)
- Portable Anymap Format (PBM / PGM / PPM)
- OS/2 Metafile (MET)
- Sun Raster Image (RAS)
- Mac Pict (PCT)
- X PixMap (XPM)
- StarView Metafile (SVM)
AO Office can open:
- WordPerfect Document (WPD)
- AutoCAD (DXF)
- T602 Document (602)
- Computer Graphics Metafile (CGM)
- Truevision Targa (TGA)
- X Bitmap (XBM)
- Zsoft Paintbrush (PCX)
- Kodak Photo CD (PCD)
AO Office can save to:
- PlaceWare (PWP)
- Macromedia Flash (SWF)
- JPG / GIF / PNG / BMP

■ Gesture Assignments ■
- Hard Press or 2 Finger Tap = Context Menu
- Pinch In & Out = Zoom In & Out
- Drag = Scrolling
- Drag with Hard Press or 2 Finger Tap = Drag & Drop

■ Limitations ■
- Not supported for macro

■ Contact Us ■
Email: support-ios@aooffice.app
Twitter: @office700

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Version 5.5.7
Support for the animation in the PPTX export.

apps.title: EXOffice
apps.description:
EXOffice is an application to provide various services for the office workers to cope with new normal of the office life. Using beacon tag or smartphone, it measures the location of the office worker and provides services such as attendance management, hoteling, telework support and office diagnosis.

[Major contents and features]
- Attendance management displays the current seating location of the worker on the indoor map. It is possible to locate the worker and display the only selected members that are registered in advance.
- Hoteling is a new service for the office use by reserving the desirable seat. Reservation can be made by the date, the building and the seat, and reservation change or cancellation are also available.
- Telework support makes the effective work management available; using this APP, the worker can make check-in/out for the work to share the work status with the colleagues, especially effective for the duty outside office.
- Office diagnosis analyzes the vast data collected through the services explained above and displays the result on the dashboard in comprehensive way.
- APP is currently available only in Japanese, but in the future it will be available in multi-language format (English, Simplified Chinese and Traditional Chinese).

apps.title: Tactic: Office Management

Our people-centric software empowers you to manage your in-office hours with tools for reserving desks, meeting rooms and parking spaces. And with our interactive office map, you will be able to see who’s coming into the office each day, making it easy to collaborate with co-workers.

Employers will appreciate the detailed insight into employee engagement and office usage, while having the power to manage capacity and monitor who is in the office. Plus, with tools for visitor management and proactively managing office health risks, employees and employers alike will be able to return to the office with peace of mind.

WORKSPACE RESERVATIONS

Tactic's desk and meeting room reservations allow you to easily facilitate in-person collaboration while managing office capacity

INTERACTIVE OFFICE MAP

View available desks, see who's going to be in office and reserve your favorite spot with the interactive office map

Whether you're in need of a quiet place to focus, a day of in-person collaboration or a space to host a meeting, Tactic has you covered.

apps.title: 8x8 Work
apps.description:
Work smarter. Wherever you are.

The 8x8 Work app for iPhone puts your business communications in your pocket—secure voice calls, HD video meetings, and team chat, all in one beautifully streamlined app. Whether in back-to-back meetings or between coffee breaks, 8x8 Work keeps you seamlessly connected.
From the first call to the final sign-off of the day, stay productive and professional, no matter where work takes you.

Why iPhone users love 8x8 Work:
+All-in-one business comms
 Make and receive business calls, start video meetings, and chat with teammates—all from one intuitive interface.

+Professional calls, personal privacy
 Use your business number to call or text—without revealing your personal phone number.

+Effortless video meetings
Launch HD video meetings with a tap, record sessions, or go live on YouTube to reach a wider audience.

+Smarter messaging
Create public or private chat rooms, share files, @mention teammates, and see who’s available in real time.


+Admin-approved
IT teams get consistent control across locations—from corner offices to kitchen tables.

Top features
+HD audio and video calling from your iPhone
+Instant meeting hosting with screen sharing and recording
+Business texting and team chat with file sharing and presence
+Customizable business hours and call handling
+Reliable performance on Wi-Fi or cellular

Ready to go?
 Requires an 8x8 X Series subscription.
Need help?
 Visit 8x8 iOS Support: https://support.8x8.com/cloud-phone-service/voice/work-mobile

apps.title: Office Design 3D
apps.description:
With Office Design 3D, designing and remodeling your workplace has never been so intuitive and quick!
Whether you want to redecorate, redesign or rearrange your office, meeting rooms, guest or lounge areas, Office Design 3D is the perfect app for you!

• thousands of furniture including hundreds dedicated to office design
• hundreds of textures and materials to choose from to customize according to your needs and wishes

SPACE PLANNING AND OFFICE LAYOUT:
- In 2D, draw walls, create openings, add dividers and glass partitions.
- Easily change walls height and thickness, the shape of the room itself, and its orientation (thanks to the compass).
- Choose from thousands of pieces of office furniture and pieces of joinery offered and easily design both the interior and exterior of your office.

CUSTOMIZATION, VISIT IN 3D AND AUGMENTED REALITY:
- Visit your project in real-time 3D and AR  as if you were walking through your creation.
Thanks to its real-time 3D engine, take a look at the impressive realistic preview of your project.
The day/night feature will show you exactly where the sun will shine throughout the day.
- Choose from hundreds of textures to customize any furniture for your project

Calling all professionals! We can make it possible to see your products in Office Design 3D, or develop a unique version of the app for your needs. Contact us at pro@anuman-interactive.com

apps.title: Video Training Course for Microsoft Office - Complete Tutorial
apps.description:
Are you a Microsoft Office beginner and want to learn the ins and outs of this amazing software? With Video Training Course for Microsoft Office - Complete Tutorial you can easily do that, because via this amazing video training tutorial we provide you with the best office training on the market. 

Many times, it can be hard to learn a complex application such as Microsoft Office and this is why we have created this training course, all so that you can have a complete and reliable Microsoft Office tutorial. In the app you can find a stellar Office tutorial that is created in the form of a video course suitable for people of all ages.

apps.title: voip office
apps.description:
Download the Voip Office mobile app for IPhone. Use the Voip Office app to make VoIP calls over Wi-Fi without using carrier minutes or use 3G/4G when Wi-Fi is not available. Manage all of your business calls, voicemails and SMS messages from your mobile device when you’re away from the office. Voip Office makes it easy to show your business number as your caller ID when you make outbound calls from your cell phone and tracks call history so you have quick access to return calls directly from your mobile app.  
Voip Office for IPhone Features:
-	Quick Dial – Allows you to store favorites and have instant access to place a call or send an SMS message
-	Contact Integration – Integrate all your contacts 
-	International calling – Use the Voip Office app to make unlimited calls to the US & Canada while traveling internationally
Important: Voip Office for IPhone requires an existing Voip Office account.

apps.title: Office Story
apps.description:
Office Story is a unique software company simulation game where you can build your own business empire with multiple offices around the world!

"...this is a game that every iOS user should experience." - 148Apps

Try to turn a small garage start-up into a large company. Take strategic decisions, buy tables and table plants, hire and train people. Fulfill their wishes! Create mobile apps and games!

From the very beginning of the game, you dive into the world of app development, where during the game you will get access to the analogs of modern app platforms. As in life, the market state is dynamic and constantly changing. New platforms come and old ones go. They just can't withstand the competition.

GAME FEATURES:

▶ 14 cities of the world,
▶ The international labor market,
▶ The rich set of goals and objectives,
▶ MyOS, Roboid, Chatbots and more,
▶ The global result table.

▶ Develop the best app:

To create a real hit isn't an easy task! You must take into account the trends and popularity of platforms. You need to build a team of motivated professionals, to create a comfortable environment for its employees, and to earn an impeccable reputation.

▶ Conquer the World:

As the game progresses you can move to a new city and country. Each location has its own labor market with its ethnic composition, professional level, and the cost of the employees. In some cities, you can meet industry stars. However, as a rule, they are expensive and want a huge salary.

▶ Compete with people around the world:

The game has a global table of results where you can compete with the world in three ways - by the quality of the project, by the team power and by revenues. The results are available for the day, week, and all time. Also, to date, the game has 25 achievements. Try to open them all!

Build a business of your dreams today with Office Story!

apps.title: Eptura Engage
apps.description:
A simple to use app that allows you to book spaces in seconds. With a few taps you can book a workstation or a meeting room, along with other areas like parking, lockers, quiet spaces, breakout zones and more.  One screen in the palm of your hand keeps you in control of your daily schedule. See all your bookings, find booked workspaces on a floor plan, and make changes or cancellations to bookings as required.  It’s never been faster to check in to a workspace, through a simple tap of a button, or automatically through proximity-based check in. When you need to collaborate with a co-worker, Eptura Engage helps make it happen. You can search in the app to find where they’re working, book an available workspace nearby and start collaborating in minutes.

Requires Eptura Engage subscription. Types of spaces that can be booked within the app depend on your organization's configuration.

apps.title: UniTel Voice Office
apps.description:
Want to run your business from your smartphone? Whether you’re on the go, in the office, or working remotely, the UniTel Voice Office App allows you to manage your business conversations from anywhere. Use the app to make audio and video calls, instant message your team members, and see who’s available or who’s busy — all from the palm of your hand. 



To use this app you must be a UniTel Voice customer who has signed up for the Office plan. 



FAQs:



1. How do I log in to this app?

To log in to this app you need to first create your own employee extension and then click “request device setup” to receive login credentials. 


Note: This app is designed to sync with your personal employee extension. So for that reason, the admin-level username and password you created at signup will not work as your app login.



2. How do I ensure high call quality using this app?

For the best experience, we recommend using a strong wifi connection. This mobile app uses your local wifi to make and receive calls. If wifi isn’t available this app will run off your cellular data. But like all VoIP technologies, if you have a weak wifi connection or a poor data signal, it can affect your call quality.



3. Is the app free?

This app is free to UniTel Voice Office customers as part of their business phone system. 



4. Do I have to use the app?

No. The UniTel Voice Office plan allows you to also connect IP-phones (physical desk phones) and softphones (computer-based phones) so business conversations can flow across your desktop and mobile devices. 



5. Can everyone on my team use this app?

Yes, every person who has their own employee extension can access and use the app to manage their business calls and messages. 

With UniTel Voice, phone system "users" and employee extensions are one-in-the-same.

apps.title: Synap Office
apps.description:
Synap Office is a free mobile office solution for iPhone which lets you view, edit and create documents at anytime and anywhere.
 
Synap Office offers excellent compatibility, allowing you to quickly view documents and edit them easily.  
 
Feature Highlights:
■ One small app includes Word, Slide, Cell
■ 100% FREE. No sign-in or subscription required
■ Fully compatible with Microsoft Office (Word, PowerPoint, Excel)
■ Supports dozens of file formats including doc, docx, txt, hml, ppt, pptx, xls, xlsx and pdf
■ Export office documents to PDF
■ Intuitive User Interface
■ Open documents from email, storage and browser apps 
■ Rich formatting features –font and paragraph styles, images, shapes
■ Insert pictures taken with your phone camera
 
Synap Office Word:
■ Compatible with MS Word (doc, docx)
■ Export Word documents to docx, pdf, hml or txt formats
■ Rich font and paragraph formatting feature
■ Insert pictures, shapes, memos and text boxes
■ Find and replace
■ Thumbnail view
 
Synap Office Slide:
■ Compatible with MS PowerPoint (ppt, pptx)
■ Slide show
■ Thumbnail and slide note view
■ Export Slide documents to docx or pdf
■ Supports detailed object properties such as images and shapes, font, paragraph
■ Insert pictures, shapes, memos and text boxes
■ Find and replace
 
Synap Office Cell:
■ Compatible with MS Excel (xls, xlsx)
■ Supports MS Excel compatible charts and filters
■ Supports MS Excel compatible formulas including 150+ math, financial, information, statistical, date/time and text functions
■ Manage worksheets
■ Export Cell documents to xlsx or pdf
■ Rich font and paragraph formatting feature
■ Insert pictures, shape, memos and text boxes
■ Find and replace
 
System Requirements
■ iPhone with iOS 7.0 or later
 
Links
■ Homepage: m.synapoffice.com 
If you have any questions, feedback or suggestions, please contact us directly at support@synapsoft.co.kr

apps.title: Office Jerk Holiday Edition
apps.description:
Happy Holidays, Jerk!

Office Jerk is home for the holidays, enjoying a night on the couch with his favourite furry friend and his favourite seasonal TV show: the beloved “Burning Log Show.”

And remember, everyone deserves a gift during the holidays. So here’s your chance to gift the Jerk! They say the best gifts are given from the heart, but the best gifts for the Jerk are given from your arsenal - now with 3 new items.

Wipe that holiday smirk off his face and let him have it!

*** Pester the Jerk with 3 brand new items!
* Complete a brand new set of Advent Challenges!
* Lookout for the New Greedy Elf!
* Enjoy Smoother and Faster Gameplay!

Complete challenges to unlock new items. Play the usual swipe-to-score game, or enjoy several mini games such as "Catch the Elf" and "Dance Santa Dance!" Shoot some stocking stuffer hoops, or really drive him crazy with some fancy channel surfing moves.

Lots of fun, and lots to do, to cure boredom - and office frustrations - during the holiday season.

Play Office Jerk: Holiday Edition today!

apps.title: Office Plus - File Sharing
apps.description:
File transfer: Cross-device, transfer files across networks.
File Management: You can create and edit PDF, EXCE and other files.
File download: The network download file is saved locally.


The files can be transmitted to and from the computer, communicated with the mobile phone, shared with third-party apps such as WeChat, and can also be imported into the album, video, address book, etc. of the machine.

Document management
1: Supports the creation and editing of text files such as PDF, EXCEl, and TXT.
2: Support the creation, modification, movement, deletion and support of multi-level folders.
3: Support search, sort, and abbreviated methods to quickly find files.
4: Support PDF saving of copied content.
5: Support the opening and reading of various documents, including office document files, pictures, videos, sound files, novel files, etc. Read all document files such as epub, pdf, excel, word, docx, doc, xlsx, xls, txt, png, jpg, gif, mp3, MP4, wav, rar, zip, etc.
6: Support deep reading of PDF files, provide different reading modes, adjust font size, edit comments, etc.

Rich and practical office essential tools
1: Calendar: Record every bit of every day
2: Reminder: Always ready to be your little assistant
3: Notepad: good memory is not as bad as a pen, important things do not fall
4: Recording: Simple and easy to use
5: Note: How do you post it?
6: Painting: a big stroke, the idea has become

Strong local management capabilities
1: Album save and backup
2: Video saving and backup
3: Save and backup of the address book

Simple network file download
1: Search or copy the download link to download the network file.
2: Web navigation, we provide a variety of classified portals, and also provides a web search function, downloading files is more convenient than a computer.

We are committed to solving all file-related issues, we will continue to update the release of more convenient and fast features, welcome to participate!

In addition, we provide feedback function in the "Office Plus” software, you can also feedback to us through the "Office Plus" software.

If you have any suggestions or comments, you can also contact us at 7chicks@sina.com

apps.title: POLARIS Office for Citrix
apps.description:
IMPORTANT : Please note that Polaris Office for Citrix is only for subscribers of Citrix and it requires unique PIN code which is allowed only for Citrix valid enterprise users. 
Polaris Office for Citrix is an enterprise application and not meant for consumer use. This application requires that Citrix servers are setup in your Company’s IT organization. INFRAWARE does not provide access key for consumer users.

- Mobile Office application installed on more than 500 million mobile devices!
- No 1. Global Market share on Mobile Office app!
- Implementing with Citrix MDX app container technology and adding features like data encryption, password authentication, secure lock & wipe, inter-app policies and micro VPNs to POLARIS Office 

■ About Polaris Office for Citrix!
Polaris Office for Citrix is a Mobile Office application that allows Citrix users to view/edit Microsoft Office (Word, Excel and PowerPoint) documents on Smartphone and Tablet. Users can view/edit text files and view .pdf and .hwp files as well. Polaris Office’s excellent rendering quality shows all the texts, charts, pictures and etc. of the documents made with Microsoft Office on a PC as the original itself without any losses. And Polaris Office for Citrix provides powerful editing features and an intuitive interface that allows you to edit document easily. Now, you can safely and conveniently view/edit important documents on your Mobile devices.

■ Key Features of Polaris Office for Citrix
View and edit Microsoft Office documents / View .pdf and .hwp files / Support Quick Scroll / Support around 80 types of Smart Arts & 18 types 2D, 3D charts / Provide more than 300 editing features / Useful & various templates for new creation / Slideshow mode / Page transition effects for slide shows / Pointer and drawing for slideshows

■ Advantages of Polaris Office for Citrix
View and edit various document types / Excellent compatibility with Microsoft Office documents / Fast document loading speed / Fabulous Presentation at anytime and anyplace / Centralize IT configuration, management, security and control with Citrix MDX technologies

■ Supported Formats
Edit (doc/docx, xls/xlsx, ppt/pptx, txt) / View (pdf, hwp, tif, png, jpg)


■ Customer support
Email : ent_support@infraware.co.kr

apps.title: Paper Calc Office
apps.description:
Paper Calc Office is an easy to use, large key, 4-function calculator tailored for the office environment. Use the powerful paper tape to review numbers you've entered, email, timestamp, put comments on any line, or bring a number from higher in the paper tape down into the current calculation.

=================
Selected by MagicSolver for Free App Magic of the day!
Selected by AppTurbo for Free "App of the Day" !
=================

Make the keys larger by sliding the LCD display up, or show more paper tape by moving the LCD display down. Two keyboards are included, or, make & save up to three of your own.

PaperCalc Office Features:

CALCULATOR MODE
=================
> Great general purpose office calculator
> Oversized +, -, x, /, = keys
> 3 display formats
. - fixed Point from 2-8 places
. - float
. - eng (power to the x3)


VIRTUAL PAPER TAPE
==================
> 250 lines of virtual paper tape
> Full-screen view of the paper tape on the right-side scroll page.
> Copy numbers or lines to the Apple clipboard
> Grab numbers from the tape to use in your current calculation
> Add comments to any line
> Double tap the calculator's LCD display to clear the paper tape.

PRINT & EMAIL
=============
> Print (requires iOS4.2 & an AirPrint printer) 
> Email an exact copy of the paper tape

EXTRAS
=======
> Move the calculator's LCD display to resize the keyboard.
> Create and save custom keyboard layouts to suit your personal needs.
> Key click sound (on/off)
> Hide rows of keys for extra paper tape space.
> Options are easy-to-access in the scroll-to-left view window.
> International number formatting (Settings -> General -> International -> Region Format -> select region)


Q & A:
=====
Q1. How does 'Office' differ from the other PaperCalc calculators?
A1. 'Office' has been designed as an easy to use chain calculator with basic math functions. The emphasis is on ease-of-use and an easy-to-follow paper trail of calculations performed.

Q2. How do I bring a number from the paper tape into my current calculation?
A2. Touch any line of the paper tape and select the number from the menu.

Q3. How can I quickly clear the paper tape?
A3. Make sure the option to 'Double Tap the LCD to Clear' is ON (see the right-side scroll page). Then just double-tap the LCD display to clear the paper tape (Office Full version only)

Q4. How do I use the '%' key?
A4. There are two ways to use the % key:

1. Obtain the % of a number:

- Press '200 % 5 ='
- Answer will be '10'
- PaperCalc took 5% of 200.

2. The % of a number is used in the operation on the number: 

- Press: '200 - 5 % ='
- Answer will be '190'
- PaperCalc subtracted 5% of 200 from 200

Q5. How do I customize the keyboard layout?
A5. Press the large "i" (info) key. Select "Edit Keyboard Layout". Then touch and move keys to change locations. Tap keys to change sizes. Save custom keyboard layouts and rename them for later use.

Q6. How do I hide the top row of keys for additional Paper Tape space?
A6. Just touch and move the Calculator's LCD display until the keyboard background flashes red. Release the LCD and the keys will remain hidden.

PURCHASE DETAILS
. Payment will be charged to your iTunes
  account at confirmation of purchase.
. This is a one-time purchase.

TERMS AND CONDITIONS
Your use of this application is governed by Interlocken Technology's Terms of Use (http://s354819480.onlinehome.us/InterlockenPrivacyPolicy/Interlocken%20Technology%20Privacy%20Policy.pdf) and Privacy Policy (http://s354819480.onlinehome.us/InterlockenPrivacyPolicy/InterlockenTechnologyTermsOfUse.pdf)

apps.title: 550 Madison
apps.description:
The 550 Madison app is the virtual space dedicated to 550 tenants and their workplace. 550 Madison is one of the great standouts along the Manhattan skyline and the app is no different.

The building will be defined by a completely customized amenity program comprised of dramatic double height events spaces, intimate dining areas, flexible social spaces, a fitness and wellness facility, and the largest green space in Midtown East.

Our state-of-the-art app allows tenants to access 550 Madison’s spectacular amenities and world-class services, including:

•Luxury concierge services
•Bespoke events
•Farm fresh food at the Café
•Grand Hall Barista and Wine Bar
•Library curated by Assouline
•Conference Center and Amenity Reservations
•Fitness and wellness services
•Streamlined Visitor Access Control and Work Order Management systems

apps.title: Call of Doodie - Run to the Office Toilet in Time
apps.description:
We hate to admit it, but we’ve all been there. It’s just like another day in the office, everything is going fine: you had that taco you like so much for lunch, you didn’t get caught ditching work, your social networks statuses are up to date and you’re about to get that promotion you’ve been dreaming about. When suddenly… Nature calls. And it’s URGENT!

Sweat start dripping from your forehead, your stomach is rumbling, soon you’re grunting and just then you realize that the nearest bathroom is all the way across the floor. It’s Call of Doodie!

“When you are eating a tasteful taco an hour seems like a second. When you can’t hold it any longer a second seems like an hour. That's relativity.” -- Albert Doodiestein

Rush through rooms and open the correct doors to find relief. Face hundreds of environments full of challenges and career-threatening situations, all that in amazing retro pixel-art graphics

SPECIAL DOORS
Surprising mechanics that will prepare you for any sitcky situation that you might get yourself into. Regular doors, sliding doors, japanese doors, castle gates, laser doors... You name it!

EVERYBODY POOPS
Unlock and play with several characters: the usual office guy, the secretary, the surgeon, the mutant, the pimp. It's good to be prepared!

Can you get to the bathroom in time?
Just hope you don't run into that goddamn new DeveloBear. Or else, it's game over.

HIGHLIGHTS
• Mind-blowing hardcore thrilling experience
• Inspired by everyday challenges of real-life
• Both entertaining and educational for all ages
• Diapers free.
• A bear.

Ready? So zip it up, fasten your belt, hold tight, and most of all, don't ruin your pants!

Disclaimer: While this App is completely free to play, some additional content can be purchased for real money in-game. If you do not want to use this feature, please turn off in-app purchases in your device's settings.

Like our page on Facebook and be the first to know about our upcoming games and updates! http://fb.com/tappshq

apps.title: Infinity Offices
apps.description:
Infinity Offices app, powered by spaceOS, is changing the way people work.
It’s the ultimate user interface to your workspace or building.
With a service-orientation toward the activities that make up day-to-day work life,
spaceOS helps modern real estate enterprises to offer an outstanding user experience.

Infinity Offices is an app that optimizes work and enhances the workplace experience.
It's a smart assistant that reduces time and effort to access your facilities, book space & amenities, create support requests or connect with colleagues.

“Today, with a smartphone in your hand, you are two clicks away from ordering food, booking meeting rooms, reporting fault, finding colleagues, unlocking doors and paying bills. We finally have digitally native workplaces.” says Maciej Markowski CEO of spaceOS.

apps.title: Office To PDF
apps.description:
*** OVER 1 MILLION DOCUMENTS SECURELY CONVERTED! ***
Convert your word, excel, or powerpoint files to PDF!  Office To PDF is a universal iOS app for both iPhone and iPad that will convert your existing MS Office files to PDF.  After conversion, files can be viewed, printed, emailed, stored in iCloud, or sent to any other app that accepts PDFs.

Features:
- Accepts multiple file formats including .doc, .docx, .xls, .xlsx, .ppt, and .pptx.
- Just touch and hold down on a file attachment from mail and select Open In Office To PDF to start conversion.
- Load and store documents from iCloud Drive
- Can accept MS Office files from any other app that can send them such as DropBox.
- Export completed PDFs multiple ways including email, iCloud Drive, and sending to another app for annotation such as Sign-N-Send.
- App includes free conversion of 3 documents.  Additional conversions can be obtained using in-app purchase.

Please Note:  this app requires an Internet connection since the file conversion happens on a secure server.  Privacy Policy: File transfer to and from the server is encrypted and the files are only machine read and not human read on the server.  The files are deleted from the server after conversion.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
This app has been updated by Apple to display the Apple Watch app icon.

Minor bug fixes
